name: City Hunting:Sniper Mission 19
description:
City Hunting: Sniper Mission 19 is an exciting first person shooting game experience of battle field sniper 3D shooting. This mountain shooting is with smooth gameplay of FPS shooter. Act as an elite force commando and finish your enemy like a spy game mission.
Features:
- Thrilling fighting
- Real environmental effects
- Exciting shooting mission
- Shocked music and sound effects
- Real and challenging FPS sniper experience
